description: Get the authorized reseller brand for the shop

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Format is 1435898930

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shop ID that needs identity your permission to

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id and path

parameters.name: page_no
parameters.description: Specifies the page number of data to return in response. Offset for pagination

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Each result set is defined as a page of information. Use this value to indicate the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if any error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error detail if the error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: This identifier for an API request for error tracking

response_fields.name: is_authorized_reseller
response_fields.description: This is to indicate whether the shop is authorized reseller

response_fields.name: total_count
response_fields.description: The number of authorized brand status shall be listed

response_fields.name: more
response_fields.description: This is to indicate whether the authorized brand list is more than one page. If this value is true, use page_no to retrieve the rest of authorized brand

children.name: brand_id
children.description: ID of the authorized brand, it may be the same or multiple brand
